Pre-Game Insights: The third ODI between Sri Lanka and the West Indies, scheduled for October 26, 2024, is set to be a thrilling finale.
Sri Lanka, led by Charith Asalanka, aims to complete a series sweep after winning the first two matches.
The West Indies will be looking to avoid a whitewash and regain momentum.
The match will feature the debut of all-rounder Chamindu Wickramasinghe, showcasing Sri Lanka’s commitment to developing young talent.
Sri Lanka has been on a roll in the ODI series, securing two wins in a row.
The West Indies have recalled experienced players Brandon King and Sherfane Rutherford to address batting inconsistencies.
Coach Daren Sammy has expressed confidence in the team’s ability to bounce back, highlighting this series as an opportunity for growth and evaluation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match details for the third ODI between Sri Lanka and West Indies: Date: October 26, 2024, Time: 2:00 PM local time (Pallekele), Venue: Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka vs West Indies Head-To-Head: Matches Played: 172, Sri Lanka Wins: 91, West Indies Wins: 77, No Result: 4.
Form Guide: Sri Lanka: W-W-W-W-W, West Indies: L-L-L-W-L.

Last 4 Matches: 2nd ODI (Oct 22, 2024): Sri Lanka won by 40 runs, Sri Lanka: 255; West Indies: 215, 1st ODI (Oct 20, 2024): Sri Lanka won by 5 wickets (DLS method) West Indies: 185/4; Sri Lanka: 234/5, 3rd ODI (June 27, 2023): West Indies won by 6 runs, West Indies: 236; Sri Lanka: 230, 2nd ODI (June 25, 2023): West Indies won by 8 wickets, Sri Lanka: 227; West Indies: 230/2.

Possible Lineup for Sri Lanka: Nishan Madushka, Sadeera Samarawickrama, Charith Asalanka (c), Dinesh Chandimal (wk), Bhanuka Rajapaksa, Dasun Shanaka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Dushmantha Chameera, Dilshan Madushanka, Pramod Madushan.

Possible Lineup for West Indies: Shai Hope (c & wk), Kyle Mayers, Brandon King, Nicholas Pooran, Sherfane Rutherford, Roston Chase, Jason Holder, Gudakesh Motie, Alzarri Joseph, Jayden Seales, Keemo Paul.
Key Players To Watch for Sri Lanka: Charith Asalanka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Dushmantha Chameera.
Key Players To Watch for West Indies: Shai Hope, Nicholas Pooran, Sherfane Rutherford.
Others: SWOT Analysis for Sri Lanka: Strengths: Spin Bowling, Top Order Stability. Weaknesses: Pace Attack, Lower Middle Order. Opportunities: Emerging Players, Inconsistent Batting. Threats: Power Hitters, Increasing Pressure.

SWOT Analysis for West Indies: Strengths: Power Hitting, Experience. Weaknesses: Top Order Fragility, Spin Struggles. Opportunities: Bouncing Back, Emerging Talent. Threats: Lankan Spinners, Lanka’s Confidence.

Prediction: The 3rd ODI between Sri Lanka and West Indies promises to be a thrilling contest. Sri Lanka, with their strong form, home advantage, and formidable spin attack, are slight favorites. However, West Indies’ resilience, powerful batting, and recent victory make them a dangerous opponent. The match is expected to be closely contested, with both teams vying for a crucial win.
